meanings.definition: A game played by two teams on a rectangular court divided by a high net, in which the ball is hit back and forth over the net.
meanings.sent1: During the volleyball match, players on each team try to score points by hitting the ball over the net.
meanings.sent2: We enjoy playing volleyball at the beach during the summer.
meanings.sent3: The volleyball game got intense when the ball kept going out of bounds.
meanings.sent4: In the office, ideas were volleyed back and forth like a volleyball in a game.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the volleyball being spiked echoed through the gym.

meanings.definition: The inflated ball used in the game of volleyball.
meanings.sent1: The volleyball felt light and bouncy when we played with it.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to inflate the volleyball before the next game.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous dog thought the volleyball was a new toy to play with.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter filled the air as she tossed the volleyball playfully.
meanings.sent5: The bright colors of the volleyball made it easy to spot on the court.
